name: Haunted Halls (mapleglaze)
description:
You're invited to a Halloween party at the haunted library, but you'll have to find your way.

With a map, a flashlight, and a cryptic invitation, you'll have to use your wits to avoid getting lost in the sprawling library and find your way to the party. Beware of the ghoulish hands that will drain your flashlight, grab you in the darkness and send you off your path.

Controls:

  • Mouse - Look
  • WASD - Move
  • M or Left-Click - Show/Hide Map
  • Scroll Wheel or Up/Down - Change selected map
  • F or Right-Click - Toggle Flashlight on/off
  • E - Take Map (when looking at a map stand)
  • Esc - Exit the game

This was made during the month of October by mapleglaze and Veilantiff for the gentle ghost jam.

Made with:

  • Unity, Blender, Krita, Aseprite
  • EB Garamond Font: https://github.com/georgd/EB-Garamond
